item.description:
***The date of this event has changed. It will take place on May 11 instead.***

Join Revolve Nation, Boston's largest entrepreneur community, for this great, large-format networking event of the season at the Greatest Bar.

Enjoy this Free event with hors D'ouevres, cash bar, and network with 100+ of the leaders and innovators in the Boston community!

PRICE: FREE

LOCATION:
The Greatest Bar
262 friend Street
4th floor
Boston, MA
617-905-0060

TIME: 6pm-8pm

Sponsors:

Exemplar Companies A first of its kind combination of Law, Business, and Investment Banking all on a value-aligned, fixed-price basis.

Revolve, Inc. Start-Up specialized professional services across law, business and capital.
item.why: It's been a cold Winter--let's celebrate the sunny weather and relax together! Come right up to the Fourth Floor!
item.name: Revolve Nation's Spring Networking Event at the Greatest Bar 5/11
